name: Exploding Dice (milkchoco)
description:
Throw explosive dice to dig deeper, but be careful not to blow away the goods.

You get eight dice you can spend on the size of the explosion, the distance you can throw the bomb, and the distance you can move. You can leave a space blank, but not all of them. (If you put nothing on distance, you gotta select your own position)

If you use the same number on distance and movement and leave the explosion blank, you can get a roll for free. Be careful, though, bigger isn't always better.

Green is 1 point, yellow is 2 points, and red is 4 points, but if you reach the bottom, you'll lose 5 points. If you get hit, you'll also lose 2 points. See how high of a score you can get!

WASD/Arrow Keys to move the camera.

Click and Drag to move the dice.

Left Click to preview the bomb throwing.

Right Click to throw the bomb or to move.

Tab to switch views.

[ and ] to mute music and sound effects. (Your mileage may vary)
